Tak Guna Berharap Perppu KPK ke Mahfud Md yang Sudah Jadi Menteri
05 Nov 2019, 20:32 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Menko Polhukam Mahfud Md meminta tak ada yang berharap padanya terkait penerbitan Perppu KPK. Alasannya, Mahfud kini adalah menteri sementara Perppu KPK adalah kewenangan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi).
Harapan kepada Mahfud terhadap penerbitan Perppu KPK ini awalnya disampaikan oleh Indonesia Corruption Watch (ICW). Menurut ICW, Mahfud, yang sempat bertemu Jokowi sebelum ditunjuk sebagai menteri, bisa mendorong Jokowi untuk menerbitkan Perppu KPK.
"Kondisi hari ini yang mana UU KPK telah direvisi dengan muatan yang sangat melemahkan institusi tersebut harusnya dijadikan isu utama bagi Prof Mahfud Md selaku Menteri Koordinator Politik, Hukum, dan Keamanan untuk segera mendorong Presiden agar menerbitkan Peraturan Pemerintah Pengganti Undang-Undang KPK," kata Peneliti ICW Kurnia Ramadhana, Sabtu (26/10/2019).
Harapan ICW itu kini direspons Mahfud. Dia mengatakan tak ada gunanya berharap padanya soal penerbitan Perppu KPK.
"Nggak ada gunanya berharap sama saya, saya nggak pegang kewenangan," kata Mahfud di Kemenko Polhukam, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Mahfud memastikan dirinya tetap menyampaikan suara-suara yang ingin agar Perppu KPK diterbitkan ke Jokowi. Namun lagi-lagi, Mahfud menegaskan kewenangan menerbitkan Perppu KPK ada di tangan Jokowi sebagai presiden.
"Saya sampaikan suara-suara itu saya sampaikan pasti tetapi yang punya kewenangan tetapi presiden," ujarnya.
text:
No Need to Expect KPPU Perppu to Mahfud Md, who has become a Minister
05 Nov 2019, 20:32 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Coordinating Minister for Political, Legal and Security Affairs Mahfud Md asked no one to hope for him regarding the issuance of the KPPU Perppu. The reason, Mahfud is now the temporary minister of the KPK Perppu is the authority of President Joko Widodo (Jokowi).
Hopes for Mahfud on the issuance of the KPPU Perppu were initially conveyed by Indonesia Corruption Watch (ICW). According to ICW, Mahfud, who had met with Jokowi before being appointed as minister, could encourage Jokowi to issue a KPPU Perppu.
"Today's condition in which the KPK Law has been revised with a charge that has seriously weakened the institution should be the main issue for Prof. Mahfud Md as the Coordinating Minister for Political, Legal and Security Affairs to immediately encourage the President to issue Government Regulations in lieu of the KPK Law," he said ICW researcher Kurnia Ramadhana, Saturday (10/26/2019).
Mahfud responded to ICW's hopes. He said there was no point in hoping for him about the issuance of the KPPU Perppu.
"There's no point in hoping for me, I don't hold authority," said Mahfud at the Coordinating Ministry for Politics and Security, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Mahfud made sure he continued to convey the voices that wanted the KPPU Perppu to be issued to Jokowi. But again, Mahfud stressed that the authority to issue Perppu KPK was in Jokowi's hands as president.
"I convey the voices, I convey them with certainty, but those who have the authority but the president," he said.
